title: Polenta pizza base
ingredients: ['1L (1 3/4 pints) warm water (45 C)', '4 tablespoons caster sugar', '25g (1 oz) dried active baking yeast', '1 dessertspoon salt', '1.25kg (3 lb) plain flour', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '100g (4 oz) butter', '1 tablespoon polenta', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '4 tablespoons grated Parmigiano Reggiano cheese']
